sentences.finnish: Pedro ja Hanna muuttavat tänään Helsinkiin.
sentences.english: Pedro and Hanna are moving to Helsinki today.

sentences.finnish: Uusi koti on korkeassa harmaassa kerrostalossa, Puistotiellä.
sentences.english: The new home is in a tall grey apartment building, on Puistotie.
They drive by car into the yard.

sentences.finnish: Pedro vie monta isoa laatikkoa pihalta ylös uuteen asuntoon.
sentences.english: Pedro carries many big boxes from the yard up to the new apartment.

sentences.finnish: Hanna ottaa tavarat ruskeasta laatikosta ja panee ne sitten isoon kaappiin.
sentences.english: Hanna takes things from the brown box and then puts them in the big cupboard.

sentences.finnish: Pedro vie kirjahyllyn, television ja sohvapöydän isoon olohuoneeseen.
sentences.english: Pedro takes the bookshelf, television and coffee table to the big living room.

sentences.finnish: Hän panee lampun matalalle pöydälle ja kirjat korkeaan harmaaseen hyllyyn.
sentences.english: He puts the lamp on the low table and the books on the tall gray shelf.

sentences.finnish: Sitten Pedro ja Hanna vievät sängyt ja yöpöydät valoisaan makuuhuoneeseen.
sentences.english: Then Pedro and Hanna take the beds and nightstands to the bright bedroom.

sentences.finnish: Makuuhuoneessa matto on jo lattialla ja lamppu on katossa.
sentences.english: In the bedroom the rug is already on the floor and the lamp is on the ceiling.

sentences.finnish: Sitten Hanna menee pihalle ja ajaa auton autotalliin.
sentences.english: Then Hanna goes to the yard and drives the car to the garage.
